successes.title: The Strange, a Tabletop RPG by Bruce Cordell & Monte Cook
successes.description:
Oz. Barsoom. Asgard. The Dreamlands. The setting of your
favorite novel or movie. Worlds even more exotic or bizarre, driven by laws of
magic, psionics, or weird science.Â What will you find when you venture into
... The Strange

Pledges.description: A LITTLE STRANGE. You receive a pdf copy of The Strange Player's Guide.
A BIT STRANGER. You receive a pdf copy of The Strange corebook and a pdf copy of The Strange Player's Guide.
STRANGE EBOOK LOVER. You receive the All the Ebooks Package.
JUST THE BOOK. You receive The Strange corebook in print plus The Strange corebook PDF. You also receive a $10 credit toward the cost of shipping (*see Shipping for details).
BASIC STRANGER. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit) plus the All the Ebooks Package.

STRANGE SIGNATURES. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit) plus the All the Ebooks Package. In addition, you receive a bookplate for your book signed by Monte Cook and Bruce Cordell.

TWO GAMES TOGETHER. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit) plus the All the Ebooks Package. You also receive a copy of the Numenera corebook in print (also includes a $10 shipping credit), and the Numenera corebook PDF shortly after this campaign closes.
STRANGE BOOKS. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit), the Player's Guide in print, The Dark Spiral adventure in print, plus the All the Ebooks Package.
STRANGE SPECIAL SIGNATURES. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit) plus the All the Ebooks Package and the Strange Fan Kit.

STRANGE PLAYTESTER. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit) plus the All the Ebooks Package. In addition, you receive all the advance materials that playtesters receive and can participate in the playtest if you wish.

A STRANGE FAMILY. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit) plus the All the Ebooks Package. You also receive 4 copies of The Strange Player's Guide and 1 copy of The Dark Spiral adventure in print (includes a $10 shipping credit in addition to the credit that is part of the Real Deal Package.).
STRANGE PRINT BOOK LOVER. You receive the All the Print Books Package (each print book carries a credit toward shipping; see details under Packages).
STRANGE LOVER OF ALL BOOKS. You receive the All the eBooks package and All  the Print Books Package (each print book carries a credit toward shipping; see details under Packages).

STRANGE RETAILER. You receive 6 copies of The Strange corebook in print, 6 copies of The Strange Player's Guide in print, and 3 copies of The Dark Spiral adventure in print. You will also receive a special retailer's kit of promotional items, and we will help promote your store on our website. Free basic shipping. We anticipate that you will receive the books ahead of general street date, and you have our blessing to offer them for sale as soon as you receive them. We will be verifying the fact that you are an actual brick-and-mortar games retailer.

PITCH ROOM ACCESS. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit) plus the All the Ebooks Package. In addition, you receive all the advance materials that playtesters receive and can participate in the playtest if you wish. Lastly, you will be given access to the online Monte Cook Games Pitch Room, where you can suggest ideas for future products or the contents of future products, and will receive credit if we use any of your ideas. (If your ideas are really amazing, you might be offered a contract to design for MCG.)

MCG SUPERFAN. You receive the All the Print Books Package (each print book carries a credit toward shipping; see details under Packages), plus the All the Ebooks Package. You will also have a subscription to every other product Monte Cook Games produces (print and pdf), including both Numenera and The Strange products, starting from the end of this Kickstarter campaign up to (and including) the launch of The Strange. (Products will be delivered as they are available and will have shipping credits similar to the All the Print Books Package.)

EARLY BIRD STRANGE SUPERFAN. You receive the All the Print Books Package (each print book carries a credit toward shipping; see details under Packages), plus the All the Ebooks Package. You will also have a subscription to every product for The Strange, starting from the launch of The Strange in 2014 through the end of 2015. (Products will be delivered as they are available and will have shipping credits similar to the All the Print Books Package.)

STRANGE SUPERFAN. You receive the All the Print Books Package (each print book carries a credit toward shipping; see details under Packages), plus the All the Ebooks Package. You will also have a subscription to every product for The Strange, starting from the launch of The Strange in 2014 through the end of 2015. (Products will be delivered as they are available and will have shipping credits similar to the All the Print Books Package.)

STRANGE CONTRIBUTOR. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit), plus the All the Ebooks Package. In addition, your name will be used as a character who belongs to the Quiet Cabal, an organization of select, modern-day humans who investigate the Strange. This character will be included in one of two group illustrations of all the contributors, and you will receive a signed high-quality print of the illustration.

STRANGE ONLINE GAMER. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit), plus the All the Ebooks Package. In addition, you receive all the advance materials that playtesters receive and can participate in the playtest if you wish. Plus, you will receive an invitation to play in an online game session (using Google+) run by Monte or Bruce. Half of the games will be run by each designer--earlier backers will get to choose in whose session they want to play if they have a preference.

STRANGE CONVENTION GAMER. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit), plus the All the Ebooks Package. In addition, you receive all the advance materials that playtesters receive and can participate in the playtest if you wish. Plus, you will receive an invitation to play in a live game session at GenCon 2014 run by Monte or Bruce. You must provide your own way to GenCon and obtain your own GenCon badge. One game will be run by each designer--earlier backers will get to choose in whose session they want to play if they have a preference.

ULTIMATE SUPERFAN. You receive the All the Print Books package (each print book carries a credit toward shipping; see details under Packages), plus the All the eBooks package. You will also have a subscription to every product for The Strange, starting from the end of this Kickstarter campaign through March of 2016. And you will have a subscription to all other products Monte Cook Games produces (print and PDF), starting from the end of this Kickstarter campaign up to (and including) the launch of The Strange. (Products will be delivered as they are available and will have shipping credits similar to the All the Print Books package.)

HAND-TOOLED TOME ULTIMATE SUPERFAN. You receive the All the Print Books package (each print book carries a credit toward shipping; see details under Packages), plus the All the eBooks package. You will also have a subscription to every product for The Strange, starting from the end of this Kickstarter campaign through March of 2016. And you will have a subscription to all other products Monte Cook Games produces (print and PDF), starting from the end of this Kickstarter campaign up to (and including) the launch of The Strange. Additionally, you may choose one of the following: Access to MCG's pitch room; your name used as a character who belongs to the Quiet Cabal, (this character will be included in one of two group illustrations of all the contributors, and you will receive a signed high-quality print of the illustration); participation in a Gen Con game with Monte or Bruce; participation in an online game with Monte or Bruce. Additionally, you will receive a one-of-a-kind, hand-bound, signed, personalized copy of corebook. This book will be made of hand-tooled leather, come in a custom presentation box, and feature exquisite hand-made detailing. Each version will be unique. (Products will be delivered as they are available and will have shipping credits similar to the All the Print Books package.)

ULTIMATE RETAILER  You receive 6 copies of The Strange corebook in print, 6 copies of The Strange Player's Guide in print, and 3 copies of The Dark Spiral adventure in print. You will also receive a special retailer's kit of promotional items, and we will help promote your store on our website. Free basic shipping. We anticipate that you will receive the books ahead of general street date, and you have our blessing to offer them for sale as soon as you receive them. We will be verifying the fact that you are an actual brick and mortar games retailer.

Further, Monte or Bruce will visit your store to do a signing and a talk, and to run a game. (Stores not in North America will need to make special arrangements.) Lastly, MCG will write an article about your store on montecookgames.com, which will be seen by thousands of gamers, and mention your store on Twitter, Facebook, and G+. Each designer will make half of the store visits--earlier backers will get to choose the designer if they have a preference.

A STRANGE DINNER. You receive the Real Deal Package (includes a $10 shipping credit), plus the All the Ebooks Package. In addition, you receive all the advance materials that playtesters receive and can participate in the playtest if you wish. Plus, you will receive an invitation to dinner in Seattle for you and a guest with the entire Monte Cook Games Creative Team, including Monte Cook, Bruce Cordell, and Shanna Germain. You must provide your own way to Seattle.

STRANGE GAME GROUP. You receive 6 copies of the Real Deal Package plus the All the Ebooks Package. Free basic shipping. In addition, you receive all the advance materials that playtesters receive and can participate in the playtest if you wish. Plus, Monte or Bruce will run a 6-session campaign for your group (using Google+) run by Monte or Bruce. Half of the games will be run by each designer--earlier backers will get to choose whose campaign they want to play in if they have a preference.
